Pygments
========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Pygments installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Pygments, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Pygments/2.18.0-GCCcore-12.3.0
```
